msbt.message: ! I heard ALL about what you're up toHow you're going to make so famous that K.K. will come here on tour!
! I heard ALL about what you're up toHow you're going to make so famous that K.K. will come here on tour!
If that actually happensohmiGOSH! That will be so cool. Sosowild! So—gah! SO TRÈS-MAZING!

You know what?! I'm going to help you chase this crazy dream!Hmmwhat can we do<10_4 /> I've got it! What if we, like, make a powerful spot somewhere on the island?!Just a big powerful center of good vibes This is the fabbest of fab ideas, don't you think so?!I've got to have something to help you out with a project like that
B-T-dubs, ? You're holding a LOT of stuff!Clear out some pocket space for the next time I see you, 'K?
That gives off STRONG vibes.I bet if you put that somewhere on the island, good energy will flow, K.K. will show up, and life will beperfect.
! How goes Project K.K., ?I'm obvi excited for the concert, but I'm, like, JUST as excited for you to build the power spot!
Keep some room in your pockets, 'K? I'll hit you up if I find any good-luck charms for the island, .
Ooh! I've got something good here. Take it!
Ooh! I've got something good here. Take this too!
That gives off STRONG vibes.I bet if you put that somewhere on the island, good energy will flow, K.K. will show up, and life will beperfect.

This is something I won in a Ms. Nintendique contest!You had to design the dress of your dreams. Mine was pink and frilly and it made you float through the air.No, I don't know how that was supposed to work either, but it was enough for the judges! Anyhoo, I was lucky enough to win this , so it might be lucky too!Go ahead, take it! Put it somewhere on this island to get that good energy flowing, !

My lucky item today is a recipe for !I was planning on making it myself, but this whole convo is, like, fate! You should have it!Craft it up and put it somewhere so cool, everyone will say, "Look at that! It's SO fab!"
